headline: American Idol: What They Wore, 5/9/12 (Top 4)
short descr: For Wednesday's performance night the theme was "California Dreaming/Songs I Wish I'd Written." From the #Idols we heard James Brown, CCR, Journey and more, and saw plenty of #fun fashion!
article: For Wednesday's performance night the theme was "California Dreaming/Songs I Wish I'd Written." From the #Idols we heard James Brown, CCR, Journey and more, and saw plenty of #fun fashion! Read on to see what and who the Idols were wearing!(Psst, have style questions? Follow me on Twitter: @SoysFashion.)HOLLIE CAVANAGH(LEFT, 1st look for "Faithfully" by Journey) Hollie wore a pop-of-color BCBGMAXAZRIA dress and leggings with Charles David shoes. Jewelry included bright London Manori earrings and bracelet, a Neon Dirt necklace, and Bebe ring.(RIGHT, 2nd look for "I Can't Make You Love Me" by Bonnie Raitt) I styled Hollie in a dark BCBGMAXAZRIA jumpsuit and belt with Bebe shoes. Jewelry included earrings, necklace, and ring from a PRB Studio Private Collection.JOSHUA LEDET(LEFT, 1st look for "You Raise Me Up" by Josh Groban) Joshua wore a Zara top with an H&M jacket, Aldo shoes, and Richard James socks. Accessories included a Nashelle bracelet and necklace, and London Manoribracelet.(RIGHT, 2nd look for "It's a Man's Man's Man's World" by James Brown) Joshua wore a Calvin Klein button-up shirt, Unconditional blazer, Zara pants, custom shoes, and Paul Smith socks. Accessories were a Nashelle bracelet and necklace.PHILLIP PHILLIPS(LEFT, 1st look for "Have You Ever Seen The Rain" by CCR) I styled Phillip in a Velvet Men shirt topped with a Levi's jacket, Gap jeans with a Calvin Klein belt, and shoes by The Frye Company.(RIGHT, 2nd look for "Volcano" by Damien Rice) He wore a Gap shirt topped with a Velvet Men button-up shirt, 7 For All Mankind jeans with a belt by Diesel, and shoes by The Frye Company.JESSICA SANCHEZ(LEFT, 1st look for "Steal Away" by Etta James) For this soulful song I styled Jessica in a statement-making ensemble consisting of a Mason by Michelle Mason shirt topped with a Skingraft leather jacket with Kizmit customizations, Rag & Bone pants, and Bebe shoes. Accessories included an Express belt, earrings from a PRB Studios Private Collection, Gasoline Glamour necklace, JewelMint bracelet, and RichRocks rings.(RIGHT, 2nd look for "And I Am Telling You I'm Not Going" by Jennifer Holliday) I styled Jessica in a colorblock dress by Renee London and Boutique Nine shoes. Jewelry included Neon Dirt earrings, a Nissa Jewelry bracelet, and RichRocks rings.Thanks for reading, and see you next week!!! X
